nodes.text: The Z'gag was something of unknown significance to the Ruurian named Slyyth. Once, when he saw Ezra Bridger, he exclaimed "By the Z'gag, it is you!"

In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Z'gag was a Ruurian river. As Slyyth was a Ruurian, it is possible that "Z'gag" referenced by Slyyth may be this as well, but since the mention is only made in passing, it can't be determined for certain.
